tagline: Nen tang lien lac dam may cho voice, tin nhan va eSIM.
overview: Chung toi cung cap dich vu voice, SMS va eSIM cho doanh nghiep, call center va doi IoT voi do on dinh cao, trien khai nhanh va gia ro rang.

services.name: Voice
services.description: Goi dien doanh nghiep, IVR va tinh nang call center.
features: IVR va dinh tuyen cuoc goi
Ghi am va luu tru cuoc goi
SIP trunk va tich hop PBX
Hang doi va phan bo agent

services.name: Messaging
services.description: SMS hai chieu cho ho tro va canh bao.
features: Bao cao giao tin va retry
Mau tin nhan va gui theo lich

services.name: eSIM
services.description: Ket noi eSIM cho thiet bi va IoT.
features: Theo doi su dung va gioi han data
Quan ly vong doi thiet bi

add_ons: Chuyen am thanh thanh van ban va phan tich
Chong gian lan va sang loc so
Dedicated IP va tuy chinh dinh tuyen

plans.name: Business
plans.includes: 3 so, 5,000 phut, 8,000 SMS, IVR co ban

plans.name: Enterprise
plans.includes: San luong cao, dinh tuyen nang cao, ho tro rieng, SLA

numbers.porting: Mien phi khi co goi dang hoat dong

onboarding: Xac minh doanh nghiep cho messaging

support.response_time: Phan hoi trong ngay lam viec doi voi goi tieu chuan

compliance: Kiem soat luu tru du lieu
greeting: Xin chao, day la bo phan ho tro. Toi co the giup gi cho ban?
